trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden som behandler den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand"> </xref> hendelse for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand> event is raised when a button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår når en knapp i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: Buttons within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control can also invoke some of the built-in functionality of the control.
trans-unit.target: Knapper i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll kan også aktivere noen av de innebygde funksjonene kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To perform one of these operations, set the `CommandName` property of a button to one of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: For å utføre en av disse operasjonene, angitt i `CommandName` -egenskapen til en knapp til en av verdiene i følgende tabell.

trans-unit.source: |CommandName value|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |"Cancel"|Cancels an edit or insert operation and returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Verdien for kommandonavn | Beskrivelse | |-----------------------|-----------------| |" Avbryt "| Avbryter en Rediger eller insert-operasjon, og returnerer det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen modusen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> events.| |"Delete"|Deletes the current record.

Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> events.| |"Edit"|Puts the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in edit mode.
Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> events.| |"Insert"|Inserts the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>hendelser. | |" Sett inn "| Setter inn oppføringen til gjeldende i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> events.| |"New"|Puts the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in insert mode.
Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> events.| |"Page"|Performs a paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>hendelser. | |" Siden "| Utfører en operasjon for Bla.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: Set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "First", "Last", "Next", "Prev", or a page number to specify the type of paging operation to perform.
trans-unit.target: Angi den `CommandArgument` for knappen til "Første", "siste", "Neste", "Forrige" eller et tall til å angi hvilken type Bla operasjonen til å utføre.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging> events.| |"Update"|Updates the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging>hendelser. | |" Oppdateringen "| Oppdaterer gjeldende oppføring i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating> events.| Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand> event is raised when a button listed in the previous table is clicked, it is recommended that you handle the events listed in the table for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating>hendelser. | Selv om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren klikker en knapp som er oppført i tabellen, anbefales det at du håndtere hendelser som er oppført i tabellen for denne operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated>

trans-unit.source: When you create a FormViewCommandEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en FormViewCommandEventHandler representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [NIB: hendelser og representanter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
